basics.name: QUANG-TUONG NGUYEN
basics.label: Electrical Engineer
basics.summary: I am a highly experienced high-voltage test engineer who has been involved in testing, commissioning, and maintaining electricity substations up to 500 kV for over six years. My main areas of expertise include diagnostic measurement, project management, and power distribution. My goal is to maximize productivity and the quality of electrical testing.

work.name: Electrical Testing Company member of HCMC Power Corporation (EVNHCMC), Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
highlights: Operating and managing 40+ staff members to supply 24-hour electrical testing services for Ho Chi Minh City’s electricity grid ensures it operates reliably.
Provided guidance, training, and development for the field electrical and instrumentation personnel approaching the condition-based maintenance (CBM) strategy.
Coordinated the preparation and implementation of execution plans in various work locations.
Reviewed, corrected, and approved technical test reports to meet industry standards.

work.name: Electrical Testing Company member of HCMC Power Corporation (EVNHCMC), Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
highlights: Focused on detailed technicalities to find the cause of failure of primary power equipment.
Apply the condition-based maintenance (CBM) strategy to primary power equipment for Ho Chi Minh City’s power grid.
Expertise in diagnostic measurement includes partial discharge (PD), dielectric loss (TD), and sweep frequency response analysis (SFRA).

work.name: Electrical Testing Company member of HCMC Power Corporation (EVNHCMC), Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
highlights: Key experience in the field of testing and commissioning of power system products and the execution of projects related to electrical power systems.
Key experience in the field of testing and commissioning of power system products and the execution of projects related to electrical power systems.

work.name: TMA Solutions, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
work.summary: Working with the R&D team to investigate some project.
highlights: Research and implementation of a project based on the UWB real-time location system (RTLS). Released a prototype version.
Research in IoT related to high-tech agriculture: build a small-scale automation system to feed plants (aquaponics). Released a prototype version.

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HCMUT), Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

projects.name: The IoT Solutions for Digital Farming
projects.summary: Build the technical solution and structure. Design and build an IoT sensor and control network based on LORA radio communication technology, cloud service, and more.

projects.name: Smart Parking
projects.summary: Working with other developers to build the technical solution and complete some motorcycle parking ensures progress, economy, and quality requirements. My task is to design, construct, operate, and debug the graphic LED display panel system that connects to the computer through Modbus communication.

projects.name: Design and manufacturing of an energy-saving controller for street light
projects.summary: During university, I designed and manufactured an energy-saving controller for street lights (250W HID lamp) that requires less power loss than traditional HID lamps. In this project, I built a VF single-phase inverter to find the matching point of maximum bright light with minimum power drain.
